recipesJson.name: Cool shamrock (shamrock shake inspired)
recipesJson.author: Misskittiii
recipesJson.description: Steep for at least a week. If you shake and vape before a week the creams just don't pick up as well. Cool minty inhale with a creamy, vanilla exhale. You can add marshmallow or sweetener if you want more of a milkshake flavor, if you want less cool mint then dial the creme de menthe back to 2% or so.
